artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Fuse Toshimaro; Publisher: Enshūya Hikobei

markings: Artist’s seal R: サクラ {Sakura} | C, L: 芳年 {Yoshitoshi} | Censor seal: 申閏三改
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: R: 応需芳年画 {ōju Yoshitoshi ga} | C: 玉桜芳年画 {Gyokuō Yoshitoshi ga} | L: 一魁斎芳年画 {Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi ga} | C: 門人年麿筆 {monjin Toshimaro hitsu}
title: View of Yokohama in Kanagawa
